00035     // Non-member callback functions
00036     static HRESULT CALLBACK D3DEnumDevicesCallback(
00037                                     LPSTR lpDeviceDescription,
00038                                     LPSTR lpDeviceName,
00039                                     LPD3DDEVICEDESC7 lpD3DDeviceDesc,
00040                                     LPVOID lpContext)
00041     {
00042         D3DDeviceList* deviceList;
00043 
00044         deviceList = (D3DDeviceList*) lpContext;
00045 
00046         deviceList->AddDevice(lpDeviceDescription, lpDeviceName,
00047                                 lpD3DDeviceDesc);
00048 
00049         // Continue enumeration
00050         return D3DENUMRET_OK;
00051     }

00054     D3DDeviceList::D3DDeviceList(LPDIRECT3D7 direct3D)
00055     {
00056         // Will create a  new driver list and enumerate it
00057         if (direct3D == NULL)
00058             throw Exception(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "NULL has been incorrectly passed as a "
00059                 "D3D interface pointer.", "D3DDeviceList Contructor");
00060 
00061         lpD3D = direct3D;
00062         // Enumerate the list
00063         enumerate();
00064 
00065     }
00066 
00067     D3DDeviceList::~D3DDeviceList()
00068     {
00069         // Release each vector item
00070         std::vector<D3DDevice>::iterator p = mDeviceList.begin();
00071         while( p != mDeviceList.end() ) {
00072             D3DDevice* pDev = &(*p);
00073             delete pDev;
00074             p++;
00075         }
00076 
00077         p = mDeviceList.begin();
00078         mDeviceList.erase(p, p+mDeviceList.size()-1);
00079 
00080     }

00083     BOOL D3DDeviceList::enumerate()
00084     {
00085         HRESULT hr;
00086 
00087         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("----- Direct3D Detection Starts");
00088 
00089         hr = lpD3D->EnumDevices(D3DEnumDevicesCallback, this);
00090         if (FAILED(hr))
00091             throw Exception(Exception::ERR_RENDERINGAPI_ERROR, "Error enumerating 3D devices", "D3DDeviceList - enumerate");
00092 
00093         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("----- Direct3D Detection Ends");
00094 
00095         return TRUE;
00096     }

00098     void D3DDeviceList::AddDevice(LPSTR lpDeviceDesc,
00099                                        LPSTR lpDeviceName,
00100                                        LPD3DDEVICEDESC7 lpD3DDeviceDesc)
00101     {
00102         D3DDevice *newD3D;
00103 
00104         // Check to see if this is a duff driver
00105         // Handle specific device GUIDs. NullDevice renders nothing
00106         if (IsEqualGUID(lpD3DDeviceDesc->deviceGUID, IID_IDirect3DNullDevice))
00107             return;
00108 
00109 
00110         // Create new driver
00111         newD3D = new D3DDevice(lpD3D, lpDeviceDesc, lpDeviceName, lpD3DDeviceDesc);
00112 
00113         // Add it to my list
00114         mDeviceList.push_back(*newD3D);
00115 
00116         delete newD3D;
00117     }

00129     D3DDevice* D3DDeviceList::getBest(int minColourDepth)
00130     {
00131         char msg[255];
00132 
00133         std::vector<D3DDevice>::iterator p = mDeviceList.begin();
00134         std::vector<D3DDevice>::iterator bestDevice = mDeviceList.end();
00135         static D3DDevice* savedBest = 0;
00136 
00137         if (savedBest)
00138             return savedBest;
00139         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Determining best 3D Device...");
00140 
00141         // For now, just get ANY hardware device that can match the following
00142         // minimum requirements
00143         // 2. Colour depth = primary surface colour depth
00144         // Add preference to TnL devices
00145         while (p != mDeviceList.end())
00146         {
00147             if (p->HardwareAccelerated())
00148             {
00149                 // Check minimum render depth
00150                 if ( (p->RenderBitDepth() >= minColourDepth))
00151                 {
00152                     // Ok, minimum caps have been satisfied so we can consider using HW
00153                     // Any device yet?
00154                     if (bestDevice == mDeviceList.end())
00155                         bestDevice = p;
00156                     // Always override SW device
00157                     else if (!bestDevice->HardwareAccelerated())
00158                         bestDevice = p;
00159                     // Add preference to HW TnL
00160                     else if (p->CanHWTransformAndLight())
00161                         bestDevice = p;
00162 
00163                 }
00164             }
00165             else
00166             {
00167                 // Software device, save for fallback
00168                 if (bestDevice == mDeviceList.end())
00169                     bestDevice = p;
00170             }
00171 
00172             p++;
00173 
00174         }
00175 
00176         sprintf(msg, "Best 3D Device is: %s", bestDevice->DeviceDescription().c_str());
00177         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
00178 
00179         savedBest = &(*bestDevice);
00180         return savedBest;
00181 
00182     }
